span.span: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派定義為事件類別。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以存取事件類別藉由指定名為的副程式**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 期間引發事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 建構物件使用目前並將其傳遞給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。The constructs an object using the current and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 您可以使用屬性物件提供給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. 如果您未指定的值屬性期間**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名識別時，才會引發事件設定的組態項目為`true`。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is by setting the configuration element to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
